snippet.title: Wizardry - Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord (1981) PC 1st-person Fantasy RPG
snippet.description:
╔═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╗
►║|   *OPEN ME FOR MORE INFOS*   |║◄
╚═════════ஜ۩☢۩ஜ═════════╝

On this channel you will find tons of first person games as an archive for ALL first person games ever published is created here. The videos show you the first 15-30 minutes of gameplay without any comment, as I don't want to influence anyone with my opinion. If you like a game, I almost always have links in the info box where you can get the game (legal) without much searching. If you like the channel, you are welcome to leave me a subscription. THX

Wizardry - Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord (1981) PC 1st-person Fantasy RPG

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Info:◄*

http://www.mobygames.com/game/wizardry-proving-grounds-of-the-mad-overlord

http://ogdb.eu/index.php?section=title&titleid=1821

https://www.igdb.com/games/wizardry-proving-grounds-of-the-mad-overlord

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Engine:◄*
???

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Other First Person Games from the developers:◄*

Wizardry 2 - Knight of Diamonds - The Second Scenario (1982)
https://youtu.be/LCPf-iIpWt0

Wizardry 3 - Legacy of Llylgamyn - The Third Scenario (1983)
https://youtu.be/eyCcPREF3Fs

Wizardry 4 - The Return of Werdna - The Fourth Scenario (1987)
https://youtu.be/BHVdT-7nZ1U

Wizardry 5 - Heart of the Maelstrom (1988)
https://youtu.be/B_LbtBrZv0s

Wizardry 6 - Bane of the Cosmic Forge (1990)
https://youtu.be/UemIFYdRWsY

Wizardry 7 - Crusaders of the Dark Savant 1992
🇬🇧 https://youtu.be/s4JghvOsrrE
🇩🇪  https://youtu.be/z3t-5zrpxps

Wizardry 8 (2001)
https://youtu.be/4C1gAyqTBFw

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►The Hall:◄* --- German/Deutsch

https://www.youtube.com/@HoFPG/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=4

*►The Hall:◄* --- English

https://www.youtube.com/@HoFPG/playlists?view=50&sort=dd&shelf_id=3

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Gameplay:◄*

00:00 - Intro
00:03 - Intro & Main
04:12 - Gameplay


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►You can get the game here:◄*

eBay U.S. (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.to/3eqGM20

eBay Germany (Affiliate link):
https://ebay.to/2W4KIgy

Affiliate links: If you buy something through these links, I get a small commission without the price changing for you. This way you can support this channel if you want

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Hall Support:◄*

My Channel Supporter:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/join

Abo / Sub:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw?sub_confirmation=1

Do you have a Ko-fi for me?
https://ko-fi.com/hofpg

G2A (Affiliate link) :
https://www.g2a.com/r/gr-5e68d48b2d24e

Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=19996679

TipeeeStream:
https://www.tipeeestream.com/hofpg/donation 

Twitter
twitter.com/hofpg

#gaming #adventure #youtubegaming #1981
